special_text:
[i](Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
Historic spells you cast can't be countered.
{W}{B}{G}: Level 2
Whenever a historic card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may exile it from your graveyard. If you do, you may cast it this turn and as though it had flash.
{1}{W}{B}{G}: Level 3
Whenever you attack, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 colorless Skeleton artifact creature token for each historic card in your graveyard.
